scripts.dev:all: pnpm run build:sdk && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5420 DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=development pnpm run dev
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:sdk && pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.start:all: pnpm run build:all && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5420 DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=production pnpm run start
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend-server && pnpm install && cd ../frontend-manager && pnpm install && cd ../packages/krapi-sdk && pnpm install
scripts.clean:all: cd backend-server && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../frontend-manager && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../packages/krapi-sdk && rm -rf dist node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.reset: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run install:all
scripts.lint:all: pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:sdk
scripts.lint:fix:all: pnpm run lint:fix:frontend && pnpm run lint:fix:backend && pnpm run lint:fix:sdk
scripts.type-check:all: pnpm run type-check:frontend && pnpm run type-check:backend && pnpm run type-check:sdk
scripts.health: pnpm run install:all && pnpm run lint:all && pnpm run type-check:all && pnpm run build:all
